description:
# Belly of the Beast TPS 3 players Coop

Singleplayer campaign mission BELLY OF THE BEAST with 3 players coop, TPS, RPG and RTS modes.

Version 1.0 was uploaded to Euro BNet

## Name in BNet "Belly of the Beast Coop TPS"

PS: BNet version is bugged now.

Video from map
